text_block_list.text:
As the season marched into summer I gradually started 
getting used to this partnership with Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!!
choice_data_list: You're doing great! Keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You've seen nothing yet! 
I'll show you what a big sister is capable of!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, my time didn't change…… 
Did I start my spurt too late?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Can I!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ahh, but…… mmyeaah, I better not.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
It's almost closing time and I have some stuff to do…… 
Yeah! I'll just try again tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Alright, I'll go put away the equipment! 
See you later, Trainer!

…… And so I was cheerfully sent on my way. 
But was it really alright not to continue training?

If I wasn't imagining it, she looked like she still wanted to run. 
What "stuff" could possibly take higher priority than —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Oh? I thought you'd already gone home.
choice_data_list: I figured I'd do a little work.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I see. Well, then, leaving the desk for later～……

Barely finished speaking, Ines Fujin began cleaning up 
the trainer's office with a deft hand.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Nnthere we go… Ah, the copier is running out of paper! 
I'll need to drop by the clerk's office on my way home.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Oh now, look at all this dust～ 
Swish swish♪

Come to think of it, the trainer's office always 
was clean, and I never ran out of anything.
choice_data_list: Have you always been doing this!?
It was you who kept the room clean!?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, well～ It bothers me to see it be a mess! 
You like shared spaces to be kept clean, right?

I certainly appreciate her helping hand, but as a trainer 
I need her to focus on training over cleaning rooms.
choice_data_list: I'm sorry. I'll take it from here!
I'm sorry. I'll take it from here!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You will? …On your own? 
Are you gonna be okay without help??
choice_data_list: Yeah. I want you to have more time to run.
Mmm, I want to give you more time to run.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
You will? …On your own? 
Are you gonna be okay without help??
choice_data_list: Yeah. I want you to have more time to run.
Mmm, I want to give you more time to run.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: That so? Let's see how you do then♪
And while I got myself pumped up to tackle this cleaning —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ah, the dust cloth's over there! And the broom and dustpan 
are a little further back, tucked neatly away in the corner!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
That should be on this shelf! No good will come from 
scattering things around so keep stuff together～

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
I left spares for those supplies over there. 
If you run out, you'll be okay just asking the clerk!
choice_data_list: T-This is tougher than I thought……!
T-This is tougher than I thought……!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Eheheh. Keep at it, keep at it～♪

That's how, with Ines Fujin's constant advice, 
I got through most of the work, but—
choice_data_list: I ended up relying almost entirely on you…!!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Huhuhumph, impressed, are you♪ 
This is the big sister power I developed at home!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
But anyway, I'd feel bad making you do all the work so why 
don't we do it together? We both use this office after all.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Come on, don't be so down about it! 
Want to join me for a cup of tea? I made some.

I had intended to help Ines out, but instead ended up 
feeling like a little kid relying on his big sister.

I had intended to help Ines out, but instead ended up 
feeling like a little kid relying on her big sister.
